channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump transportation secretary pick Sean Duffy to face Senate confirmation vote
item.description: The Senate to hold a vote on Tuesday on whether to confirm President Donald Trump's transportation secretary nominee, Sean Duffy.

item.title: Don’t Substitute Tariffs for Income Taxes: You’ll Get Both
item.description: Replacing income taxes with tariffs would not work and would likely result in a higher tax burden for Americans.

item.title: Yes, Republican Leaders Have The Authoritiy To Rein In Birthright Citizenship
item.description: The framers added the Fourteenth Amendment's 'subject to the jurisdiction thereof' clause for an important, specific reason.
